content.question: How is Horum in numero avunculus meus et suis libris et tuis erit (lines 10-11) translated?

choices.label: My uncle will be among the number of these people by means of both his and your books.
My uncle will be in a number of these books—both because of their writings and yours.
My uncle has a number of these books—both those men’s and your own.
My uncle has his own and your own books in great number.

content.answer: My uncle will be among the number of these people by means of both his and your books.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
